entry.title: My first blog website
entry.content:
To say at first

After one and a half hours, I have successfully constructed my first blog website. I’ve used GitHub, Hexo, Sublime, node for the construction.

I’d like to use it as a memorandum on the way of technologie progress. I will note the techniques that I’ve learned, the interesting courses, and the solutions to several difficulties as well.

For now, my skill on Markdown is not yet at a master level. But it will be practiced little by little.

Welcome to my small tech house.
